bill_title: accommodate legislation relating to education in South Dakota.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to accommodate legislation relating to education in South Dakota. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: In case a title affecting education or the ordinary operating expenses of South Dakota is needed to accommodate the legislative process, this bill is being introduced to accomplish that purpose. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
